name: AWS EC2 Metrics
description: The Sumo Logic App for AWS EC2 Metrics allows you to collect your EC2 instance metrics and display them using predefined search queries and Dashboards. The App provides Dashboards to display analysis of EC2 instance metrics for cpu, disk, memory, network.

children.name: 1. AWS EC2 Metrics - Overview
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - Overview dashboard provides at-a-glance information about a EC2 CPU, memory, network and disk usage.
children.title: 1. AWS EC2 Metrics - Overview

panels.title: Average CPU Idle

queries.queryString: metric=CPU_Idle account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by entity

panels.title: Overall Average CPU Load (1m, 5m, 15m)

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_1min | avg by metric
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_5min | avg by metric
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_15min | avg by metric

panels.title: Total Free System Memory per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_Free | avg by entity

panels.title: Total Used, Less Buffers and Cached Memory per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_ActualUsed | avg by entity

panels.title: Disk Used Bytes per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Used

panels.title: Disk Available Bytes per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Available

panels.title: Network InByte Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InBytes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Network OutByte Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_OutBytes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Average CPU Utilization

queries.queryString: metric=CPU_Sys account={{account}} region={{region}} namespace={{namespace}} entity={{entity}} | avg

panels.title: Average Memory Usage

queries.queryString: metric= Mem_UsedPercent account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg

panels.title: Average Inbound Connection

queries.queryString: metric= TCP_InboundTotal account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg

panels.title: Average Outbound Connections

queries.queryString: metric= TCP_OutboundTotal account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg

panels.title: Average Received Bytes

queries.queryString: metric= Net_InBytes account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg | eval _value/1024/1024

panels.title: Average Sent Bytes

queries.queryString: metric= Net_OutBytes account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg | eval _value/1024/1024

panels.title: Instances

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | count by instancetype, entity

queries.queryString: metric= Net_OutBytes account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg | eval _value/1024/1024

panels.title: Instances

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | count by entity, instanceType

children.name: 2. AWS EC2 Metrics - CPU
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - CPU dashboard provides details information about a EC2 CPU usage.
children.title: 2. AWS EC2 Metrics - CPU

panels.title: CPU User Time per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_User | avg by entity

panels.title: Overall Average CPU User Time

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_User | avg

panels.title: CPU System Time per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_Sys | avg by entity

panels.title: Overall Average CPU System Time

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_Sys | avg

panels.title: CPU 1min Average Load per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_1min*  | avg by entity

panels.title: Overall Average CPU Load (1m, 5m, 15m)

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_1min | avg by metric
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_5min | avg by metric
account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_LoadAvg_15min | avg by metric

panels.title: CPU Idle Time per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_Idle | avg by entity

panels.title: Overall Average CPU Idle Time

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_Idle | avg

panels.title: CPU IO Wait Time per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=CPU_IOWait | avg by entity

panels.title: User time per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: metric=CPU_User account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by entity

panels.title: System time per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: metric=CPU_Sys account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by entity

panels.title: CPU Consumption per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: metric=CPU_LoadAvg_1min account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by entity

children.name: 3. AWS EC2 Metrics - Memory
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - Memory dashboard provides details information about a EC2 memory usage.
children.title: 3. AWS EC2 Metrics - Memory

panels.title: Total Memory per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_Total | avg by entity

panels.title: Percent Memory Used per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_UsedPercent | avg by entity

panels.title: Total Free, Buffers and Cached Memory per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_ActualFree | avg by entity

panels.title: Total Used, Less Buffers and Cached Memory per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_ActualUsed | avg by entity

panels.title: Total Free Memory per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_Free | avg by entity

panels.title: Total Used System Memory per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Mem_Used | avg by entity

panels.title: Memory Used Percentage per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: metric=Mem_UsedPercent account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by entity

panels.title: Actual Memory Used Percentage per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: metric=Mem_ActualUsed account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}}
metric=Mem_Total account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}}
(#A/#B)*100 as ActualUsedPercentage | avg by entity

children.name: 4. AWS EC2 Metrics - Disk
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - Disk dashboard provides details information about a EC2 Disk usage.
children.title: 4. AWS EC2 Metrics - Disk

panels.title: Disk Used Bytes per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Used

panels.title: Disk Available Bytes per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Available

panels.title: Disk Read Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Reads | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Disk Read Byte Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_ReadBytes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Disk Write Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_Writes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Disk Write Byte Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Disk_WriteBytes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Used Percentage per Directory

queries.queryString: metric=Disk_UsedPercent account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by entity, DirName

panels.title: Writes per Directory

queries.queryString: metric=Disk_Writes account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | avg by entity, DirName

children.name: 5. AWS EC2 Metrics - Network
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - Network dashboard provides details information about a EC2 Network activities based on In and out packets, bytes.
children.title: 5. AWS EC2 Metrics - Network

panels.title: Network InPacket Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InPackets | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Network OutPacket Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_OutPackets | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Network InByte Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InBytes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Network OutByte Rate per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_OutBytes | sum by entity | rate

panels.title: Average In Packets per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_InPackets | avg by entity

panels.title: Average Out Packets per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=Net_OutPackets | avg by entity

children.name: 6. AWS EC2 Metrics - TCP
children.description: The AWS EC2 Metrics - TCP dashboard provides details information about a EC2 connection details.
children.title: 6. AWS EC2 Metrics - TCP

panels.title: Inbound Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_InboundTotal | avg by entity

panels.title: Outbound Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_OutboundTotal | avg by entity

panels.title: Listen Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_Listen | avg by entity

panels.title: Established Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_Established | avg by entity

panels.title: CloseWait Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_CloseWait | avg by entity

panels.title: TimeWait Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} metric=TCP_TimeWait | avg by entity

panels.title: Inbound Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: metric=TCP_InboundTotal account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | sum by entity

panels.title: Outbound Connections per EC2 Instance

queries.queryString: metric=TCP_OutboundTotal account={{account}} region={{region}} entity={{entity}} namespace={{namespace}} | sum by entity
